name: Agility, Mobility & Acrobatics (Kicky Flips & Ninja Movement)
description: Training explosive speed, aerial movement, acrobatics, and evasion techniques for elite combat mobility.

workout_groups.name: Sprint, Pivot, and Evade Combos
workout_groups.description: Developing explosive footwork, rapid directional changes, and combat agility.

workouts.name: Combat Directional Sprints
workouts.description: Short bursts followed by a rapid pivot and dodge to simulate evading attacks.

workouts.name: Jeet Kune Do Footwork Drills
workouts.description: JKD’s explosive intercept-and-move technique for lightning-fast reaction dodging.

workouts.name: Shaolin Evasion Steps
workouts.description: Continuous step-and-slide movement to maintain speed while dodging incoming attacks.

workouts.name: Silat Combat Maneuver Sprints
workouts.description: Sprint into a Silat off-line pivot stance, then redirect instantly.

workouts.name: Wushu Rapid Directional Vaults
workouts.description: Sprinting into a rapid vault over an obstacle for high-speed transitions.

workout_groups.name: Speed Shuffle Drills
workout_groups.description: Developing lateral speed, reaction time, and evasive agility.

workouts.name: Lateral Shuffle to Drop-Step Evade
workouts.description: Move side-to-side rapidly, then drop low to evade an incoming strike.

workouts.name: Muay Thai Cut-Angle Step
workouts.description: Simulates angle-cut movement used in combat footwork to outmaneuver an opponent.

workouts.name: Capoeira Side Shuffle Switch
workouts.description: Integrates Capoeira’s Ginga movement into rapid evasions and offensive transitions.

workouts.name: Wushu Step Vault Transitions
workouts.description: Combining foot vaulting over obstacles with lateral speed shifts.

workouts.name: Explosive Drop-Step Sprint
workouts.description: Drop low, sprint forward instantly, and pivot to evade an opponent’s reach.

workout_groups.name: Multi-Directional Sprinting & Evasion
workout_groups.description: High-speed agility training that integrates rapid footwork changes.

workouts.name: Zig-Zag Sprint and Cut
workouts.description: Sprint in a zig-zag pattern, cutting direction sharply at each turn.

workouts.name: Reaction-Based Sprint Starts
workouts.description: Sprint only on an external cue, reacting to an unexpected signal.

workouts.name: Sprint, Drop Roll, and Recover
workouts.description: Sprint forward, drop into a tactical roll, and recover instantly into a sprint.

workouts.name: Reverse Sprint & Pivot Attack
workouts.description: Sprint backward while maintaining combat stance, then pivot and sprint forward to attack.

workout_groups.name: Agility & Quickness Ladder Drills
workout_groups.description: Footwork precision training using agility ladder patterns to enhance movement speed.

workouts.name: Ladder Quick Step Shuffle
workouts.description: Rapidly shuffle in and out of the agility ladder with controlled movement.

workouts.name: Explosive Crossover Steps
workouts.description: High-speed crossover stepwork through the agility ladder.

workouts.name: Two-Step Ladder Sprint
workouts.description: Sprint forward while stepping precisely through each agility ladder box.

workouts.name: Lateral Ladder Hop & Pivot
workouts.description: Lateral hopping through the ladder with a pivot at each transition point.

workouts.name: Double-Speed Agility Ladder Steps
workouts.description: Step through the ladder at double speed while maintaining full control.

workout_groups.name: Jumping Power & Air Control
workout_groups.description: Plyometric exercises, directional jumping, and wall runs for explosive movement and aerial precision.

workouts.name: Wall Runs
workouts.description: Run up the wall using climbing bars or pull-up bars, aiming for a higher reach each time.

workouts.name: Directional Hurdle Jumps
workouts.description: Jump over hurdles at different angles to develop directional agility.

workouts.name: Wushu Airborne Step Vaults
workouts.description: Vault over obstacles with step-and-kick techniques.

workouts.name: Taekwondo Push-Off Hurdle Kick
workouts.description: Kick off an obstacle, launching into a high spinning kick.

workout_groups.name: Tumbling & Breakfall Mastery
workout_groups.description: Developing controlled falls, rolls, and tactical recoveries to transition smoothly in combat.

workouts.name: Basic Backward Roll
workouts.description: Practice rolling backward while keeping the neck tucked and minimizing impact.

workouts.name: Basic Forward Roll
workouts.description: Controlled rolling forward while staying compact and balanced.

workouts.name: Side Shoulder Roll
workouts.description: A tactical roll to distribute impact and recover smoothly.

workouts.name: Low Squat Fall Recovery
workouts.description: Practicing controlled landings from a squat to prevent injury.

workouts.name: Backward Breakfall (Judo Style)
workouts.description: Absorbing impact safely when falling backward by slapping the mat.

workouts.name: Side Breakfall (Judo / Silat)
workouts.description: Learning to fall to the side safely while reducing impact.

workouts.name: Rolling Breakfall (Aikido, Capoeira)
workouts.description: A smooth rolling fall to distribute energy and continue movement.

workouts.name: Jump, Land, and Roll Drill
workouts.description: Jumping forward and absorbing impact through a controlled roll.

workouts.name: Wushu Drop-Step Recovery
workouts.description: A sudden drop into a controlled landing stance to avoid impact.

workouts.name: Breakfall Recovery (Silat, Capoeira)
workouts.description: Practice falling and rolling smoothly to reduce impact damage.

workouts.name: Cartwheel & Handstand Variations
workouts.description: Develop balance and controlled aerial transitions.

workouts.name: Wushu Side Flip Drill
workouts.description: Practice explosive sideways flips with controlled landings.

workouts.name: Silat Dive Roll Recovery
workouts.description: Rolling over obstacles and transitioning into a defensive stance.

workout_groups.name: Kicky Flip Progression
workout_groups.description: Building up aerial kicking techniques into fully combat-viable flipping attacks.

workouts.name: Basic Step-Up Kick
workouts.description: Step up onto an elevated surface and extend a front kick to develop balance.

workouts.name: Silat Off-Line Pivot Kick
workouts.description: A controlled low spinning kick to train foot positioning before aerial kicks.

workouts.name: Taekwondo Jump Step Kick
workouts.description: A stepping jump into a chambered kick to train aerial motion.

workouts.name: Capoeira Ginga-to-Kick Transition
workouts.description: Rhythmic footwork transitioning into a side or roundhouse kick.

workouts.name: Muay Thai Jumping Knee to Kick Combo
workouts.description: Jumping knee strike transitioning into a kick mid-air.

workouts.name: Jeet Kune Do Cross-Step Jump Kick
workouts.description: A cross-step followed by an explosive airborne kick.

workouts.name: Wing Chun Flash Kick
workouts.description: A short-range, fast airborne kick designed for rapid execution.

workouts.name: Baguazhang Spinning Sweep to Kick
workouts.description: A fluid spinning sweep followed by a rising aerial kick.

workouts.name: Butterfly Kick (Wushu)
workouts.description: A sweeping aerial kick that generates horizontal rotation.

workouts.name: Tornado Kick (Taekwondo)
workouts.description: A spinning kick with powerful impact and speed.

workouts.name: Capoeira Meia Lua Flipping Techniques
workouts.description: Aerial kick combinations from Capoeira for high mobility combat.

workouts.name: Muay Thai Jumping Roundhouse
workouts.description: Launching into an airborne roundhouse strike with precision.

workouts.name: Wushu Aerial Butterfly Twist
workouts.description: A high-speed aerial twist while delivering a spinning kick.

workouts.name: Capoeira Macaco Kick
workouts.description: A reverse handstand kick used for acrobatic combat movement.

workouts.name: Shaolin Tornado Flip Kick
workouts.description: A high-flying 540-degree rotational kick executed mid-air.

workouts.name: Wing Chun Rapid Flash Kick Series
workouts.description: A lightning-fast chain of airborne flash kicks.

workout_groups.name: Elite Combat Acrobatics
workout_groups.description: Advanced movement and flipping techniques designed for combat applications.

workouts.name: Wushu Tornado Flip
workouts.description: Aerial tornado rotation for high-speed kicking.

workouts.name: Capoeira Aerial Butterfly Transition
workouts.description: Blending aerial kicks into fluid transition movements.

workouts.name: 360 Spin Kick with Flip Recovery
workouts.description: Executing a 360-degree aerial attack with a safe landing.

workouts.name: Wushu Kick-Over Handspring
workouts.description: Advanced combat tricking incorporating a full kick-over handspring.

workout_groups.name: Wall Runs & Vertical Power
workout_groups.description: Building explosive vertical movement for climbing, vaulting, and aerial maneuvers.

workouts.name: Basic Wall Kick-Off Step
workouts.description: Lightly push off a wall and land safely, building foundational wall-run ability.

workouts.name: Silat One-Step Wall Climb
workouts.description: A stepping kick-off to ascend walls with controlled foot placement.

workouts.name: Parkour Cat Grab Training
workouts.description: Jump to grab a ledge and pull up, simulating real-world climbing scenarios.

workouts.name: Wall Runs
workouts.description: Run up the wall using climbing bars or pull-up bars, aiming for a higher reach each time.

workouts.name: Wushu Wall-to-Backflip Prep
workouts.description: Step up, launch backward, and land safely to build backflip control.

workout_groups.name: Directional Hurdle Jumps & Air Control
workout_groups.description: Enhancing aerial movement through hurdle jumps and directional leap training.

workouts.name: Low-to-High Box Jumps
workouts.description: Progressive jumping heights to improve explosive leg power.

workouts.name: Directional Hurdle Jumps
workouts.description: Jump over hurdles at different angles to develop directional agility.

workouts.name: Taekwondo Push-Off Hurdle Kick
workouts.description: Kick off an obstacle, launching into a high spinning kick.

workouts.name: Capoeira Aerial Side Hurdles
workouts.description: Perform a meia-lua-style vault over barriers, integrating flips.

workouts.name: Wushu Multi-Step Directional Air Control
workouts.description: Combining step, leap, and kick for precise mid-air movement.

workout_groups.name: Aerial Rotation & Flip Control
workout_groups.description: Advanced airborne techniques to improve aerial orientation and flipping efficiency.

workouts.name: Butterfly Kick (Wushu)
workouts.description: Generate horizontal spinning motion for airborne control.

workouts.name: Tornado Kick (Taekwondo)
workouts.description: Develop rotational power for combat-ready aerial kicks.

workouts.name: Silat Aerial Knee Vault
workouts.description: Leap over obstacles while tucking the knee for combat efficiency.

workouts.name: Wushu Airborne Step Vaults
workouts.description: Vault over obstacles with step-and-kick techniques.

workouts.name: Capoeira Flipping Techniques
workouts.description: Advanced Capoeira flips integrating defensive and offensive movement.

workout_groups.name: Explosive Jump Training
workout_groups.description: Plyometric jump workouts for increasing overall jump height and reactivity.

workouts.name: Basic Box Jumps
workouts.description: Jump onto a stable surface, landing softly with knees slightly bent.

workouts.name: Standing Vertical Jumps
workouts.description: Jump straight up as high as possible, focusing on landing control.

workouts.name: Ankle Bounces
workouts.description: Quick, light jumps using only the ankles to improve lower leg elasticity.

workouts.name: Tuck Jumps
workouts.description: Jump and bring knees to chest for explosive power development.

workouts.name: Bounding Jumps
workouts.description: Leap forward from one leg to the other to develop single-leg power.

workouts.name: Standing Broad Jumps
workouts.description: Jump forward for maximum distance to develop leg drive.

workouts.name: Depth Jumps
workouts.description: Drop from a ledge and jump instantly to develop reactive power.

workouts.name: Explosive Step-Ups
workouts.description: Step onto an elevated surface with a jump for unilateral power.

workouts.name: Jumping Split Lunge
workouts.description: Explosive split lunge jump to develop rapid leg power.

workouts.name: Triple-Hop Directional Jump
workouts.description: Hop forward, laterally, and back for agility and foot control.

workouts.name: Wushu Tornado Jump
workouts.description: Execute a 360-degree airborne spin, landing softly with balance.

workouts.name: Capoeira Kick-Off Jumps
workouts.description: Push off the ground into a jump, simulating evasive Capoeira movement.

workouts.name: Muay Thai Switch-Knee Jumps
workouts.description: Jump explosively while switching knee strikes in mid-air.

workouts.name: Wall Run to Vertical Jump
workouts.description: Run up a wall and explode upward into a high vertical leap.
